inputParameters.name: refCrv
inputParameters.description: Referenced curve or line, Guid of curve or line in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: ZVec
inputParameters.description: Vector defining the orientation of the cross-section (corresponds to the height dimension). If None, a default will be taken.

inputParameters.name: W
inputParameters.description: Width of the cross-section (usually the smaller dimension).

inputParameters.name: H
inputParameters.description: Height of the cross-section (usually the larger dimension).

inputParameters.name: Gr
inputParameters.description: Name of a group or subassembly.

inputParameters.name: update_attrs
inputParameters.description: If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.
